name: Squaretangle
description:
Squaretangle is a fast-paced puzzle game for Android.

In each level you have to either take all squares or collect all of the coins. Oh, Squaries love the coins 😸!

This means that you have to plan ahead! And - you have to act really, really fast!

But sometimes even that is not enough and the only things that can save you are quick reflexes and good memory!

------------------

You can support me by disabling the ads in the game! I would really appreciate that, it will help me out to make more games and tune this one more :).
